name: Number 2: Ninja Shadow Mosquito
text:
2+ Level 2 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle. You take no battle damage from battles involving this card. Your opponent's monsters must attack if able. When a monster declares an attack: You can activate 1 of these effects;
? Detach 1 material from this card, and if you do, place 1 Hallucination Counter on 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. (The effects of monsters with a Hallucination Counter are negated.)
? Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of 1 monster with a Hallucination Counter.
